title: Replace site logo with user-provided logo

requirements.text: Replace the current INNO YOUTH logo asset with the user-provided uploaded logo, and update the site to render the new logo in all places where the logo appears (header and footer).
acceptanceCriteria: A new logo image file is added under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` based on the user-uploaded logo.
`frontend/src/components/site/SiteHeader.tsx` uses the new logo asset path for the header logo image.
`frontend/src/components/site/SiteFooter.tsx` uses the new logo asset path for the footer brand image.
The logo displays crisply and is not stretched (keeps aspect ratio) on mobile and desktop.

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (shadcn components are read-only).
Do not edit immutable hook/entry files listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (compose around them instead).
Keep the backend unchanged (no schema/state changes needed for a logo swap).
nonGoals: Rewriting site copy, changing layout, or updating other brand assets (hero image, icons) beyond the logo swap.
Adding new authentication, analytics, or third-party integrations.

required: INNO YOUTH logo with three abstract human figures (red/yellow/blue) and “INNO - YOUTH” text, transparent background (inno-youth-logo-v2.dim_512x512.png)
